name: Another Dungeon Crawler (Henrik, snurlsss, MartinZetterman)
description:
Explore dungeons and kill enemies in this Game&Watch themed game. Increase your level to handle harder enemies. How far will you get?

What is Another Dungeon Crawler

Draw your sword and get ready to fight your way through endless retro dungeons! How far will you get? Kill enemies and clear dungeons to find out!

Controls
  • [WASD]:
    Move on the grid.
  • [Spacebar]:
    Attack.
  • [U]:
    Switch to Game A (Easy).
  • [I]:
    Switch to Game B (Hard).
  • [P]:
    Pause the game.
The Team

Henrik Nilsson Game DesignProgrammer

Martin Zetterman Game DesignAudioArtist

James Young-Rogers Game DesignArtist

The process

This game was made in 2 weeks during the Experimental Games course at Uppsala University.
